title: V2 preflight check
body:
I would like a CLI tool to list the current chars and do a preflight check for them,
1. check if the llm is working (write one text)
2. check if the twitter login works (login and write a tweet)
3. check if the discord is working
4. check if all the plugins are loading and needed


Currently the start command takes some time to check everything and generate a tweet so it would be great
to check everything.

title: Discord Messages disappearing randomly
body:
**Describe the bug**

Messages randomly disappear after they are sent to Discord using callback().

**To Reproduce**

Just send about 2-4 messages back to back, and you'd see some of those disappearing. Happens to me.

**Expected behavior**

All messages to stay in chat.

**Screenshots**

[issue demonstration](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1BgjRX4UCPKi4Mk73WG7gnyfq--AdIxhm/view?usp=sharing)

**Additional context**

<!-- Add any other context about the problem here. -->

comments.author: github-actions
comments.body: Hello @D3nii! Welcome to the elizaOS community. Thank you for opening your first issue; we appreciate your contribution. You are now an elizaOS contributor!
